channel.title: Small christmas rant - goodbye 2009 hello 2010
channel.description:
I feel its time for a rant. NO locking please moderators :| i want to see other peoples opinions
Note: Seeing as mardy people i.e. anfernio dislike me not bothering to type properly lik diz, i will write out this whole rant using almost perfect grammar (to the best of my ability - laziness will make me type pathetic :P)
[size=30pt][u] Seeing as we are dawning on a new year, i think that these are some things that can be changed in our community[/u][/size]
[b][u]1. Old winterLove bases[/u][/b]
Its come to my attention that people are still using sources back from times like cheezscape, allstarscape e.t.c. PLEASE!!! If you are going to release a server on these forums, don't make them from bases like this:
http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,410658.0.html
Using Hyperion is the only way we are going to go forward. Please do not flame me on what i have just said about Hyperion. When i was immature i hated hyperion. I now realise how stable it is, even though i never use it.
[b][u]2. The lack of use of Hyperion[/u][/b]
What do i mean? Nearly all of the downloads are Non - Hyperion related and to me that's telling me that no - one is using it. If you have been here for a while, worked with winterLove bases and now want to start a new server, USE HYPERION OR CLEAN WINTERLOVE!!! There are loads of great tutorials on run serba and siblasoft that will help you on your way - like almost perfect woodcutting, fishing e.t.c.
[size=15pt]That's all of my rant finished. I think if we start to move away from messy winterLove, our RuneScape private servers are guaranteed to move forward
To support me, in your siggy put this:[/size]
[size=20pt][b]Im supporting the change of base! Clean and stable is the way forward![/b][/size]
Please note: Im not 100% anti-winterLove, its just deltascape and other winterLove base are way overused. Hyperion is far more stable, more enjoyable, more efficient and nicer to work with.

item.title: Small christmas rant - goodbye 2009 hello 2010
item.dc:creator: @lesterknome lesterknome
item.description:
@lesterknome wrote:

If any of you actually knew how winterlove is constructed, its purely brilliant, i cba to move on to Hyperion. WinterLove is epic period, there is nothing you can do to change this community until someone release a fully built Hyperion source

Read full topic

item.title: Small christmas rant - goodbye 2009 hello 2010
item.dc:creator: @The_Reaper_X The Reaper X
item.description:
@The_Reaper_X wrote:

[quote=“cows1471, post:34, topic:321742”][quote author=Fat Cookies link=topic=418174.msg3074096#msg3074096 date=1261693826]
ps, thanks to this thread I decided to do some stuff with hyperion to make it easier to use.
omg I created addItem and sM methods and made a starter command…
Would this simplification of the server encourage you people to use it?

edit:
This is how easy I have made it:

} else if(command.startsWith("money") && playerRights == 2) { player.addItem(995, 100000); player.sM("You have just recieved your starter"); }
Looks just like any other server execpt you have to call the player class because not everything is crammed into client.jarrrrbaaaaa

Kihomura, I will create shortcuts to important classes, so I will make a shortcut called: “COMMANDS OMG OMG OMG” and link it to the CommandPacketHandler class.

[/quote]
Thats good development fat cookies id happily use it :P[/quote]No you wont.

[quote=“Jc22493, post:35, topic:321742”]@cows1471: You’re telling others to use Hyperion when you haven’t even attempted to use it. I’m sure you couldn’t do much on it if you could even get it to run…[/quote]This.

The fact that you haven’t even used Hyperion goes to show what anyone can expect of this community. How you can support, let alone start, a cause when you’re not even practicing it is beyond me. It’s incredibly hypocritical.

Read full topic

item.title: Small christmas rant - goodbye 2009 hello 2010
item.dc:creator: @Anfernio Anfernio
item.description:
@Anfernio wrote:

Charlie bit me, and it really, really hurt

Retards do not know how to run Hyperion

I guess I don’t know how to run Hyperion

Read full topic

item.title: Small christmas rant - goodbye 2009 hello 2010
item.dc:creator: @chassy13 Chassy13
item.description:
@chassy13 wrote:

Many people want everyone to switch to more advanced bases such as Hyperion. Will it happen? No. You want hundreds of people who have programmed servers to switch? This won’t happen, people are lazy and something such as DeltaScape provide a base for them to work off of.

Also, keep the 2012 crap off this thread.

Read full topic

item.title: Small christmas rant - goodbye 2009 hello 2010
item.dc:creator: @cows1471 cows1471
item.description:
@cows1471 wrote:

[quote=“xxlukexx, post:24, topic:321742”]This thread isn’t going to do fuck all to stop any of the shit servers out there and what people are making.

  1. Most people don’t even view this board.
  2. No one would change, because delta is most used.
  3. I do agree, noobs need to get off sources like allstar as its a pile of junk…

So, really, not many of us are going to change…[/quote]

Agreed. Thankyou for agreeing with me. Im gonna post somthin which will get me a warned now, but its worth it.[br][br][size=1]Posted on: December 24, 2009, 02:36:59 pm[/size][hr][quote=“ollie123, post:21, topic:321742”][quote]
When i was immature i hated hyperion.
[/quote]

really mature flaming me when I’m actually trying to show my support for your cause[/quote]

I know im sorry. Im ill, grumpy and a stupid little sod.

Accept my apology?[br][br][size=1]Posted on: December 24, 2009, 02:39:19 pm[/size][hr]Thankyou for supporting[br][br][size=1]Posted on: December 24, 2009, 02:40:34 pm[/size][hr][quote=“LilXCj, post:22, topic:321742”][quote author=cows1471 link=topic=418174.msg3073701#msg3073701 date=1261682728]
I feel its time for a rant. NO locking please moderators i want to see other peoples opinions

Note: Seeing as mardy people i.e. anfernio dislike me not bothering to type properly lik diz, i will write out this whole rant using almost perfect grammar (to the best of my ability - laziness will make me type pathetic :P)

[size=30pt] Seeing as we are dawning on a new year, i think that these are some things that can be changed in our community[/size]

1. Old winterLove bases

Its come to my attention that people are still using sources back from times like cheezscape, allstarscape e.t.c. PLEASE!!! If you are going to release a server on these forums, don’t make them from bases like this:

moparisthebest.com

moparisthebest.com

programming, irc, cars

Using Hyperion is the only way we are going to go forward. Please do not flame me on what i have just said about Hyperion. When i was immature i hated hyperion. I now realise how stable it is, even though i never use it.

2. The lack of use of Hyperion

What do i mean? Nearly all of the downloads are Non - Hyperion related and to me that’s telling me that no - one is using it. If you have been here for a while, worked with winterLove bases and now want to start a new server, USE HYPERION OR CLEAN WINTERLOVE!!! There are loads of great tutorials on run serba and siblasoft that will help you on your way - like almost perfect woodcutting, fishing e.t.c.

[size=15pt]That’s all of my rant finished. I think if we start to move away from messy winterLove, our RuneScape private servers are guaranteed to move forward

To support me, in your siggy put this:[/size]

[size=20pt]Im supporting the change of base! Clean and stable is the way forward![/size]

Please note: Im not 100% anti-winterLove, its just deltascape and other winterLove base are way overused. Hyperion is far more stable, more enjoyable, more efficient and nicer to work with.
[/quote]

[IG]http://i48.photobucket.com/albums/f211/Dolphin4442/Animated%20gifs/epicfacepalm.jpg[/img]

Actually, destroy the download section, bunch of fail sources anyway.

EDIT: Minus Hyperion.[/quote]

Nothing wrong with clean, stable winterLove.

Read full topic
